subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Before Manny Ramirez captivated baseball fans with his swing, swagger, antics, and eventual exit amid failed drug tests, he was a regular high school star from Washington Heights.
snippet: Before Manny Ramirez captivated baseball fans with his swing, swagger, antics, and eventual exit amid failed drug tests, he was a regular high school star from Washington Heights.
